headerValue: Do you have fabric with you?
contentValue: Our agent will come to your doorstep and collects your fabric. Our experienced tailors will stritch as per your instructions.
Our authorized agent will come to your doorstep to take the measurements/old shirt. You just need to provide your free time slot
Based on your garments quantity and style, an expected delivery date will be sent over the message or you can track it on our mobile app.
Once the stritching is done, our authorized agent will deliver the cloths to your door step with free of cost. the same you can track it on mobile app.
